Translations.Text: Y S. (Yaa Vide)
Quran ut est foderator de wisdom
multus assuredly vos (Rashad) est 1 de messengers
On straight path
Hoc revelation est ex Almighty Merciful
To warn people parentes nunquam warned ergo they est unaware
It predetermined ut multus de them non believe
Nos locus their necks shackles up their chins Consequently they become locked their disbelief
Nos locus barrier them barrier behind them sic nos veil them; they non vide
est same vos warn them non they non believe
Vos heeded unus those uphold hoc message reverence the Multus Gracious! - Et when alone their privacy. Dedit them bonus news forgiveness generous recompense
Nos certainly revive peritus nos actum everything they perfecit in hoc vita alias prout consequences ut continue their decessus! Everything nos comes profound actum
Cite pro them example people community ut received messengers
When nos sent to them 2 (messengers) they disbelieved them. Nos tunc supported them 3. They dictus Nos est (Deus) messengers vos
They dictus Vos est non multus than human beings nos. The Multus Gracious non send anything. Vos est liars
They dictus Noster Dominus knows nos est sent to vos
Noster sole mission est deliver message
They dictus Nos consider vos malus omens Vos refrain nos surely stone vos afflict vos painful retribution
They dictus Tuus omen depends tuus response statim ut vos reminded Indeed vos transgressing people
Vir advenit alius finis oppidum dictus, O my people subsequentis messengers
Subsequentis those non ask vos pro any wage ac guided
Why ego non worship Unus initiated me should to Eum est tuus ultimate return
Ego set Eum deus? the Multus Gracious willed any harm me their intercession non help me 1 bit nor potuit they rescue me
Tunc ego est totally astray
Ego habet believed in tuus Dominus; please listen to me
(Apud the temporis de his decessus) he told Iniit Paradise. He dictus Oh Ego wish my people knew
Ut my Dominus forgiven me factus me prenobilis
Nos non send down his people eum militis caelum; nos non send them down
Totus took est 1 blow whereupon they adhuc
Quam sorry est people's status! Omnis temporis messenger iit them they semper ridiculed eum
they non vide quam multus generations nos annihilated ante them quam they nunquam return them
Omnis unus de them summoned ante nos
signum them est denatus terra nos revive it produce ex it grains their food
Nos grow it gardens datum palms grapes nos causa fons gush out therein
Hoc est provisus them fruits let them manufacture their suus manus whatever they need they est thankful
Glory est 1 qui created totus generis de plants terra alias prout themselves alius creations ut they perfecit non et know
Alias signum them est nox nos remove daylight therefrom whereupon they est in darkness
sun sets specific location design Almighty Omniscient
moon nos designed comparuit stages it becomes veteris curved sheath
sun est nunquam catch up cum moon - Nox feria nunquam deviate - each de them floating its suus orbit
Alias signum them est ut nos carried their patres loaded ark
Tunc nos created same them ride in
Nos willed nos drowned them their screaming non heard nor could they saved
Instead nos shower them cum mercy, let them enjoy pro awhile
autem when they told Learn tuus preter work righteousness tuus future ut vos attain mercy
Non matter quod generis de proof dedit them their Dominus they consistently disregard it
When they told Dedit deus provisions vos those disbelieve dictus to those believe nos dedit those DEUS feed si He ita willed? Vos est really far astray
They alias challenge When ut promise advenit pass vos est truthful
totus they vide est 1 blow overwhelms them dum they dispute
They non et habet temporis factus testimentum nor testimentum they est able to return their people
horn blown whereupon they rise ex grave iit their Dominus
They dictus Woe to nos. Qui resurrected nos noster decessus? Hoc est quod the Multus Gracious promised messengers est rectus
Totus take est 1 blow whereupon they summoned ante nos
Ut feria non anima wronged in the parvus Vos paid precisely whatever vos perfecit
dwellers Paradise est ut feria happily busy
They abide their conjux beautiful shade enjoying comfortable furnishings
They habet fruits therein; they habet anything they wish
Greetings pax ex Merciful Dominus
Prout pro vos O guilty unus vos est set aside
perfecit ego non covenant vos O Infans Adam ut vos non worship devil Ut he est tuus ardent enemy
Ac ut vos worship Me alone Hoc est rectus path
He misled multitudes de vos. Vos non possess any understanding
Hoc est Hell promised vos
Hodie vos burn it consequence tuus disbelief
Feria nos sigillum their mouths their manus feet bear testis everything they perfecit
Nos testimentum nos veil their eyes consequently when they seek path they non vide
Nos testimentum nos freeze them in locus; ergo they potuit nec move forward nor iit
Whomever nos permit vivens pro ut long temporis, nos revert eum to marasmus! they non understand
quod nos taught eum (messenger) non est poetry nor est he (poet)! Hoc est formidable proof profound Quran
To preach to those est alive expose disbelievers
they non vide nos habuit created them noster suus manus livestock they suus
Ac nos subdued them them; some they ride some they eat
They derive alius benefits ex them alias prout drinks they non est appreciative
They set DEUS alius deus perhaps they est de help to them
On the contrary they non help them; they finis serving them prout devoted militis
Ergo non saddened their utterances! Nos est fully aware de everything they conceal everything they declare
human est non vide nos perfecit created eum ex tiny drop tunc he turns into ardent enemy
He levabat question nos - dum forgetting his initial creation - Qui resurrect bones post they rotted
Dictus Unus initiated them in the 1 locus resurrect them! He est fully aware de omnis creation
He est Unus creates vos green trees fuel quae vos burn pro light
Non est Unus created caelum terra able to recreate the same sic indeed; He est Creator Omniscient
totus He perfecit carry any command est dictus to Est it est
Ergo glory est 1 in whose manus est sovereignty totus things Eum vos returned
